snippet: Pelican, which makes protective cases often used by the military, now sells a case designed for people who fear their iPads are in for some serious abuse.
abstract: Pelican, which makes protective cases often used by the military, now sells a case designed for people who fear their iPads are in for some serious abuse.

headline.main: A Bombproof Case for Your iPad
headline.print_headline: A Hard Case for Protecting Electronics From Life’s Knocks
